query: mutation createCourses($command: CreateCoursesCommandInput!) { createCourses(command: $command) { ...instanceGroupCourse __typename } } fragment instanceGroupCourse on Course { reference price paper { reference name shortName body { reference shortName name __typename } __typename } level { reference shortName name __typename } sitting { reference name startDate endDate __typename } courseType { reference description vatRule { reference description __typename } __typename } region { reference name __typename } clients { reference name __typename } numberOfSessions instituteFee status publishedDate createdOn updatedOn __typename }
